items.name: Invicta Men's Aviator Stainless Steel Quartz Watch with Silicone Strap, Blue, Black 26
items.description:
• Stainless steel case 49mm diameter x 11mm thick; Blue dial; Luminous hands

  • Japanese quartz movement, VK63A Caliber; Assembled in Japan; SR936SW battery included

  • Blue silicone band, 210mm L x 26mm W; Buckle clasp

  • Flame Fusion crystal; Push/pull crown; Uni-directional stainless-steel bezel with rose gold top bezel ring; Functional Sundials: 60min, 60sec, 24hr; 100- meter water resistant: Suitable for recreational surfing, swimming, snorkeling, sailing and water sports. Not suitable for diving.

media.source: https://cdn.chec.io/merchants/26320/assets/zZjQjChoo2Yv5Lw3|Invicta Men's Aviator Stainless Steel Quartz Watch with Silicone Strap, Blue, Black 26.jpg
